headline: Comcast Brings High-Speed Internet and Lift Zone to McDuffie County, Celebrates with Laptop Giveaway and Block Party
summary: Comcast has completed a broadband expansion project in McDuffie County, Georgia, bringing reliable, high-speed Internet, mobile and security services from Xfinity and Comcast Business to residents and businesses for the first time.

headline: Comcast’s (CMCSA) $19M Expansion Brings Speed and Support to Bossier City
summary: Comcast Corporation (NASDAQ:CMCSA) is one of the best depressed stocks to buy in 2025. On August 5, Comcast Corporation announced a $19 million initiative to enhance Bossier City’s high-speed internet infrastructure, aiming to complete the project by late 2026. New services will launch in select neighborhoods this year, offering internet plans starting at $14.95/month with […]
